    Package Description
    obfuscated
    Contains all classes with obfuscated names.
    org.schema.game.common.controller

    A package containing the classes dedicated to the modding API.

    • Uses of SegmentController in obfuscated

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Called whenever a SegmentController is taking damage

      void Ks.onSegmentControllerDocking(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a entity docks on a SegmentController
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerHitByBeam(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a SegmentController is hit by a beam(this may include support beams)
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerHitByLaser(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a SegmentController is hit by a Cannon's projectile
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerHitByMissile(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a SegmentController is hit by a missile
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerHitByPulse(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a SegmentController is hit by a pulse(this may include push pulse)
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerPlayerAttached(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a player enters a block on a SegmentController
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerPlayerDetached(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a player exits a block on a SegmentController
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerSpawn(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a SegmentController spawns
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerUndocking(SegmentController sc)
      Called whenever a entity undocks from a SegmentController
      void Ks.onSegmentControllerUpdate(SegmentController sc)
      Called every tick of the universe
